title: The Pale Elf
tags: how to unlock the pale elf
content:
ng his master Cazador. After spending the night with Astarion, we learned that he has some kind of poem carved into his back. Cazador did this to him - but why?

Eventually, as you progress further, you will be given a new objective.

Seek out the devil Raphael.

Astarion wants to speak to Raphael the next time we see him. He believes the devil might know something about the scars on his back.

You will meet Raphael as he stops you in multiple locations as you explore. You will also catch him at
